vl-ui-action-group demo

Meer voorbeelden en documentatie.

Action group

        
          <div is="vl-action-group">
            <button is="vl-button">
              Aanvraag starten
            </button>
            <button is="vl-button" secondary>
              Annuleren
            </button>
          </div>

Action group align center

        
          <div is="vl-action-group" align="center">
            <button is="vl-button">
              Aanvraag starten
            </button>
            <button is="vl-button" secondary>
              Annuleren
            </button>
          </div>

Action group align right

        
          <div is="vl-action-group" align="right">
              <button is="vl-button">
                Aanvraag starten
              </button>
              <button is="vl-button" secondary>
                Annuleren
              </button>
          </div>

Action group space between

        
          <div is="vl-action-group" space-between>
            <button is="vl-button">
              Aanvraag starten
            </button>
            <button is="vl-button" secondary>
              Annuleren
            </button>
          </vl-action-group>

Action group with links

        
          <div is="vl-action-group">
            <a href="#" is="vl-link">
              <span is="vl-icon" icon="bell" before></span>
              Notificaties
            </a>
            <a href="#" is="vl-link">
              <span is="vl-icon" icon="graduate" before></span>
              Opleidingen
            </a>
            <a href="#" is="vl-link">
              <span is="vl-icon" icon="pin" before></span>
              Locaties
            </a>
        </div>
Notificaties Opleidingen Locaties

Action group with bordered links

        
          <div is="vl-action-group" bordered>
            <a href="#" is="vl-link">
              <span is="vl-icon" icon="bell" before></span>
              Notificaties
            </a>
            <a href="#" is="vl-link">
              <span is="vl-icon" icon="graduate" before></span>
              Opleidingen
            </a>
            <a href="#" is="vl-link">
              <span is="vl-icon" icon="pin" before></span>
              Locaties
            </a>
          </div>
